title: From His Heart With Jeff Schreve - 25 Sermons
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------
FROM HIS HEART WITH JEFF SCHREVE - 25 SERMONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

From His Heart is the TV, Radio and Internet broadcast outreach of Pastor Jeff Schreve. He believes that no matter how badly you have messed up in life, God has a heart of love for you!

He proclaims real truth, real love and real hope from the loving heart of God to those who are losing hope. Our world is desperate to help a new generation discover their creator through the preaching of the uncompromised truth of the Gospel in a practical, memorable, and powerful way.

Pastor Jeff "tells it like it is" with clear biblical content combined with engaging, personal stories that are relevant, compassionate, and humorous. His messages are filled with real life-giving principles for everyday living.

Today's torrent contains 25 bible inspired sermons preached during the 2013 calendar year.  Each sermon is about 25 minutes long.  Details of all 25 topics include...

 * 2013 - All Systems Go
 * 2013 - It's Timew To Get Out Of The Boat - Part 1
 * 2013 - It's Timew To Get Out Of The Boat - Part 2
 * 2013 - Never Too Broken
 * 2013 - So You Want To Be A Disciple - Part 1
 * 2013 - So You Want To Be A Disciple - Part 2
 * 2013 - Storage Wars - Part 1
 * 2013 - Storage Wars - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Death - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Death - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Embarrassment - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Embarrassment - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Failure - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Failure - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of God - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of God - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Man - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of Man - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Fear Of The Future - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Fear Of The Future - Part 2
 * 2013 - The Origin Of Fear - Part 1
 * 2013 - The Origin Of Fear - Part 2
 * 2013 - When The Doubts Come - Part 1
 * 2013 - When The Doubts Come - Part 2
 * 2013 - Why Bad Things Happen

And while you're at it, if you haven't already, be sure to check out some of my other Sermon Packages found here on The Pirate Bay.  To date there are 17 packages to choose from (accounting for 747 sermons in total) including...

 * A New Beginning With Greg Laurie - 40 Sermons
 * A Quick Word With Beth Moore - 59 Sermons
 * Back To The Bible With Woodrow Kroll - 60 Sermons
 * Daily Hope With Pastor Rick Warren - 45 Sermons
 * FamilyLife Today With Dennis Rainey - 60 Sermons
 * From His Heart With Jeff Schreve - 25 Sermons
 * Grace Church With Pastor Troy Dobbs - 60 Sermons
 * Grace To You With John MacArthur - 23 Sermons
 * Insight For Living With Chuch Swindoll - 22 Sermons
 * Lighten Up With Ken Davis - 35 Sermons
 * Living On The Edge With Chip Ingram - 16 Sermons
 * My Family Talk With Dr James Dobson - 22 Sermons
 * PowerPoint With Jack Graham - 30 Sermons
 * Precepts For Life With Kay Arthur - 75 Sermons
 * Unlocking The Bible With Colin Smith - 30 Sermons
 * UpWords With Max Lucado - 83 Sermons
 * Walk In The Word With Dr James MacDonald - 62 Sermons

For His Glory,
TorrentTracts - September 2013
